26_1EZTWytasXcKdiUFnN4KHqAfvg1nwkTkKv.body:
> [nofish](#comment_896_1J3rJ8ecnwH2EPYa6MrgZttBNc61ACFiCj): Packing a bitcoin, ipfs, namecoin, etc. into one big, monolithic application would reduce the portability of ZeroNet , would use much more resources and by that make it impossible to run on mobile, so there is no plans on doing that. 
> But it's easy to extend ZeroNet by plugins, so anyone can add his/her favorite protocol.

I think it is wrong to consider the P2P network formed by the mobile now. Because the mobile's storage capacity is too small. We must consider a sufficient number of personal computers to form a basic network. To have enough people to use zeronet, in order to have enough personal computers to form the underlying network.

To attract enough people to use, first you must  have an attractive thing. Zerotalk is ok. And the development of zerotalk technology has all have, upload pictures, embed video, set up the administrator, just need to integrate it.

This does not require Packing a bitcoin, ipfs, namecoin, etc. into one big, monolithic application.

If zerotalk builds a basic network, there is a technical problem that has not yet been solved, and the establishment and maintenance of large-scale P2P database. I think this is the real problem and development of zeronet will face to.

For example, from 100000 personal computers constitute zeronet basic network, each computer to take 30G hard drive capacity, 100000X30G = 3000T. So big a P2P database, how to build? How to run How to maintain This is the real problem.

Once zeronet can build a stable base network, the number of personal computers will be far more than 100,000 units. On this basis, is to consider when the mobile to join.

Before the foundation network is established, no matter how smart a person is, no matter how much favorite protocol can increase, will not succeed.

> [hexkey](#comment_23_18NsJqjikBYBjwLzMVp7aBJSpqtyRSd9qF): People use a lot of mobile devices, and being able to use Zeronet on them would make people like it more. Also, streaming data instead of downloading is becoming more popular (like Netflix/Spotify/Youtube), so being able to do some amount of that is a good idea too.
> 
> That example isn't totally right. A network can be very redundant, or have high capacity, but having more of one means having less of the other. You can have more of each, but that's much harder. (this page explains it a little more).
> For example, if there was only one site with a size of 30GB, then the whole network can only store 30GB. I know it's not really like that--but in the real network, just adding up the storage of each device isn't correct.

I know that mobile phone applications are more extensive, but by the personal computer constitute a basic network is more feasible. The advantage of P2P networks lies in the storage space of a large number of personal computers. If you do not make full use of the personal computer's spare storage space, compared with the internet network there is no advantage. Mobile phone can be connected to the server, there is no need to use zeronet.

Streaming data is good idea, but too much attention to it is not necessary. Twister is to rely entirely on streaming data, the result is not received posts. Of course, this problem can be solved, to reduce the distribution of old posts in the node on the line, but this again complicated the problem.

I can see from your reply, you also know that a huge P2P database operation and maintenance is a difficult point.（But having more of one means having less of the other. You can have more of each, but that's much harder.）

> [bot](#comment_145_1KdnTJVBGzEZrJppFZtzfG9chukuMv8xSb): I joined a year ago just after the ZeroHello upgrade with it's default apps skillfully made by nofish.Although 0list was also listed it was heavily spammed and mostly unusable for zite discovery.Then there are search engines once people can find those.
> But every time we (or anyone) starts 0net we see the same default apps atop our zite list. (besides any favorites we might have) This is not a failing of nofish to create a set of uniform zites for people to get started, but for people who stay here there are issues with this design.
> For example, the working proxy sites with their long lists on ZeroHello are a good gateway, perhaps better than a static list since we can see popularity and know what is alive and updated. But 0lists a like hitting "I feel lucky" on Google. We end up with many crappy random half-loaded zites with few or no peers, and then have to go through our ZeroHello deleting the mess again. So for me the homepage is the bottleneck. Perhaps this is also what kai0 means by "no images on the homepage".
> Long story short, i've always thought that the default homepage should be an open app store for everyone. But besides asking everyone to edit their config file to change the homepage there was no real way forward, whether i could make a good store or not.
> Then a couple of months ago i started an Fuzium (Electron) version of Zeronet, and found installer packaging allows me to set the homepage, saving people having to edit config files! So i've made a basic app store for Fuzium, and it seems to be working okay, and also works as a standalone zite, but without bookmarking manager and other Fuzium features. I'm just adding delete and rating options, but the basic store layout can be seen here;
> http://localhost:43110/1LANDERvVWbShpNWpsrbBvfqSK1PabXtwv
> {TLDR: still a work in progress}
> https://github.com/kustomzone/Fuzium/blob/master/gfx/fuzium-screeny2.jpg

topic.title: 这个站点开发的非常好了

topic.body: P2P developers should be aware that a large number of old computers are idle.These old computer hard disk is 320G, P2P development should make full use of these old computer hard disk capacity.
topic.title: These old computer hard disk is 320G

topic.body:
For zeronet, as long as we can easily do their own blog, can post, send pictures, can send 10m short video, blog owners have enough space, such as 10g-20g, blog followers can Decided not to take up too much hard disk capacity, such as 1g, so zeronet has been successful.

Forum, social functions can be resolved later.
topic.title: What is the success of zeronet?

topic.body:
Zeroblog build our own blog fairly easy, although the initial node to get some problems, but can be established, the problem can be put into the future optimization.

Zeroblog post no problem, upload pictures are no problem.

Upload MP3 files, sites
Http://127.0.0.1:43110/1C3ah92vYUG7MMxMZ36HerQXNojSZtp2Lb/ do a good job. And can distribute MP3 files.

Upload MP4 files should also be similar, you can solve.

The next step is how much space the blog owner can have, and whether bloggers can control the amount of hard disk usage. 

Zeronet is only a step away from success.
topic.title: Zeronet is only a step away from success

topic.body:
Blog owners have 20G of space is enough, 10G put text and pictures, 10G put video. Each video does not exceed 10M, 1000 video 10G. General personal blog will not have 1000 videos. Personal computer 500G hard drive, with 20G to do blog, accounting for very little space.

Blogger followers will not be interested in all the content of a blog, so only a small amount of hard disk space is required. Such as no more than 1G.

However, we will pay attention to many blogs, 20 blog concern may have 20G. Of course, can adjust the space for each blog size better.

We are concerned about the content of each blog can be stored separately, can also be stored together. The key is to cancel the attention of a blog can delete all its contents. This will not take up too much of our hard disk space.
topic.title: Blog owner 20G is enough

topic.body: After hitting the video address, it will automatically play. And then can not return to our own blog.
topic.title: Bug report

topic.body:
News sites generally have a few people management, which is the same zero-net blog account to run on several computers.

Several computers on the same account with the blog article, the result is a few computer blog content is not the same.

If the design of the same account can not synchronize data, then this news blog will not run.

The reality is whether the design allows the synchronization of data, due to network reasons, several computers synchronization data is also very difficult, so that news sites can not enter the zero network.

Zero-blog must be designed to copy, merge site data. If you can not synchronize data, just copy and merge the data for the site. This way news sites can enter the zero-net blog.
topic.title: This causes the news site can not enter the zero net blog

topic.body:
Videorama just put a link upload (in fact, the video downloaded to our computer), youtube to enter the Chinese market. But this copyright issue how to deal with I do not understand.

Of course, youtube do a lot of their own site, we download and forward more easily, and no copyright issues.
topic.title: Youtube into the Chinese market without any technical difficulties

topic.body: why the zerotalk with img no more dve?
topic.title: are there any zerotalk with img can clone?

topic.body: Built their own zerotalk site, the number will not be more, rarely more than 100 people, active speaking people generally only a few. So zerotalk with img, the picture should be displayed on the home page.
topic.title: zerotalk with img the picture should be displayed on the home page

topic.body:
If I build a zerotalk, you can send pictures. There are 100 people involved, each person's computer hard drive to take 1G, then there are 100G. To build a database of this 100G, which is enough for us 100 people to send text posts and pictures, of course, can not send high-definition pictures, we do not need to send high-definition pictures. (If each person 's hard drive takes 10 G, then there is a T, and 100 people are enough for a few years.

Each add a person, an increase of 1G. If there are 50 people to join, then increase 50G, into 150G, and automatically revised to 150G to establish a database.

If the database is full, you can press the first-in first-out method, the previous text and pictures deleted. We save a lot of text and pictures are useless.

If there are mobile phone users to join, you can use some less storage, such as 100-200mb.
topic.title: If I build a zerotalk, you can send pictures.

topic.body: http://127.0.0.1:43110/1C2JhCunGLtvyX56nQ88tcb87WnXspjWN/
topic.title: anyone can make it to display img on home page?

topic.body:
Zerotalk with img need to show the picture on the home page, also need to be able to embed video, set the administrator.

To complete these three functions, zeronet was completely successful.
topic.title: To complete these three functions, zeronet was completely successful.

topic.body:
Zerome is suitable for commercial capital development, because it has a public key that can control everyone's speech. This is not suitable for a fully open free network.

Zeroblog and zerotalk no public key, can not control other people's speech, are completely open free network.
topic.title: Zerome is suitable for commercial capital development

topic.body: http://127.0.0.1:43110/15QCUnCyYRW3b16YSvjwGvw3AYDD5JZXqC/
topic.title: good  one

topic.body:
For the Chinese people, zeroblog + zerotalk will be able to completely break through the Chinese government's network blockade. Like zerome such a structure, just more functional, more fancy some. For the Chinese people to break through the network blockade, access to information, but no more meaning.

However, the development of zeroblog and zerotalk is much easier than zerome.

Experience tells us that zeronet development, will soon face confrontation with the Chinese government. Zerome's many fancy features of the development, will soon become meaningless.

Zeronet's network infrastructure has a lot of problems. The simplest is that there are many nodes and connections, but there is no data transmission, a large number of files are lost. In the case of network infrastructure there are still many problems, do not pay attention to the network infrastructure, can not attract a large number of Chinese people to participate in the provision of a large number of nodes, how to confront the Chinese government's network blockade?

For Westerners, zeronet such software is a "novelty" that is not a "must" that can be expected in a very long period of time, zeronet in the West will not have a lot of users.

If you compare the development of Linux, zeronet now focus on the development of zerome, should have more than 10 years to be widely used. The early development of linux, there is the involvement of commercial capital, such as "red hat". Are there any commercial capital involved in zeronet now? I'm not clear.
topic.title: Experience tells us

topic.body:
Whenever someone builds a group, the owner of the group will pull into dozens of people. This will provide dozens of nodes for zeronet.

Zerotalk is equivalent to the Chinese people widely used "social group". Generally a group consists of dozens of participants. Like this group in China overwhelming, countless.

Group of basic functions in addition to post, but also to send pictures, and displayed on the home page, but also to send video, can set up the administrator.

As soon as possible to develop the basic functions of zerotalk, the picture displayed on the home page, can be embedded into the video, can set the administrator.

If zerotalk can build 1000 groups, then there are tens of thousands of people, and can provide tens of thousands of nodes.

Say it again，Whenever someone builds a group, the owner of the group will pull into dozens of people. This will provide dozens of nodes for zeronet.
topic.title: Let millions of Chinese enter zeronet

topic.body: Chat is too simple, people do not want to come; blog has been successful, but the news site reluctant to come in; zerotalk is easy, developers do not want to develop; zerome difficult, short-term difficult to succeed, developers are over there.
topic.title: Zeronet's status quo

topic.body:
I carefully observed some sites, in fact, as early as 2015, some smart people have developed a lot of technology, these are zeronet's success must have.

Further development only need to integrate these technologies, almost enough. Do not know why more than 2 years, has not yet completed integration.

In the zeronet development direction, I think, there are some problems.
topic.title: In the zeronet development direction, I think, there are some problems.

topic.title: 在零网建立个人自己的油管频道才能推广零网
topic.body:
要想尽快的推广零网的使用，我想只有3个办法。

1,在零网博客建立10几个新闻网站，每天发布国内外的新闻。可是现在海外的新闻网站都不肯进来，现在零网上发布新闻的几个站点如陆公子的博客，西域武僧的博客，新闻量都不够，更新也太慢，数量也太少，这样无法推动零网发展。那么是不是能有其他个人来建新闻博客呢，我感到也不容易。或者几个人合作建立新闻论坛，或许还有些可能。

2,能让大家做自己的群组。这个需要能发图片，而且图片还得能显示在主页上。现在的几种论坛，ZeroTalk不能发图片，ZeroNet Central与IFS 倒是完全成功了，可是中国人不喜欢这种形式，ZeroTalk with image图片又不能显示在主页上，zerome除了技术上还不完备，五毛，共特一大堆，让人对zerome保持了很大的戒心，这些都限制了零网的发展。

3,零网的视频网站能像油管那样具有丰富的资源。可是现在零网的视频网站大都不太行。而且最主要的是资源实在太少，又杂乱。

所以能够推广零网发展的3个办法现在几乎都不行。

我认为目前唯一可行的是打通零网与油管的连接。按Fastcast站点的方法，在零网建立个人自己的油管频道，这样资源比较集中，也很丰富，可以快速推广零网的使用。

而且站点一旦能够成功建立，就可以生产基于零网的电视机机顶盒，可以有商业利益。这样就能更快的推广零网的使用。机顶盒可以外接硬盘运行。这样，机顶盒24小时运行，零网的节点就会非常多，网络的传输速度将比现在高出100倍。

topic.title: 巨大的商机--全球销量超过30亿台
topic.body:
先把零网与youtube打通，在零网上建立个人youtube频道的站点，这个只需要照抄零网这个站点就可以了。http://127.0.0.1:43110/1qJ3EM5rTa2wPTBvJuCFjdLXjrBCgBkR8/

然后，大家都能克隆，建立自己的零网youtube站点。使用的人就多了，资源就丰富了。

这样就可以做基于零网的电视机机顶盒了。机顶盒要能够外带硬盘运行。这样的机顶盒不但在中国有巨大的市场，连非洲这样的电脑不普及的地区都有巨大的市场，不需要电脑就能上网，就能浏览youtube。

topic.title: Huge business opportunities - global sales of more than 3 billion units
topic.body:
First zero network and youtube get through, in the zero network to establish a personal youtube channel site, this only need to copy the zero network this site on it.
http://127.0.0.1:43110/1qJ3EM5rTa2wPTBvJuCFjdLXjrBCgBkR8/

Then, everyone can clone and build your own zero network youtube channel site. The use of more people, the resources to enrich the.

So you can do based on the zero network of the TV set-top box. Set-top box to be able to plug the hard disk to run.This set-top box not only in China has a huge market, even the African computer is not popular areas have a huge market.No computer, mobile phone can also browse youtube.
